评论概述: this timepiece is fantastic for the money
评论详情: what a bargain! i have had this watch for a month now. i set the time to sync to the second with my computer's time. after a month it was 2 seconds off.  i always read the negative reviews first. many complained that their watches fell off due to a faulty band. i can assure you that when PROPERLY fastened this watch becomes part of your wrist!.  the only 2 things that were a bit disappointing were that the gold watch has a gold face and gold hands which makes it hard to read the time. if the hands and 5 minute markers were black or white the issue would be non existent. the other issue is the date window. i am older and the date window is so small it's impossible for me to read. fortunately i realized these problems existed before i made my purchase and decided that they were not important to me.  rest assured that if you pull the trigger on this purchase you will be pleased you did.  i do not work for this company and i paid for the watch.

Love the look and feel of the watch. It’s sleek, looks great on the wrist, and even has a great adjustable metal strap. There is a huge but… the date doesn’t change at midnight. Tried at first to change for the day before the actual date and see where midnight was, but upon hitting midnight it acted like it wanted to shift, but didn’t. Seems the internal mechanics aren’t quite right. Left it without changing the date, and has stayed the same date since. Not acceptable for a new watch. If you’re in the watch game, if you’re a watch maker, this has to pass QC and shouldn’t fail for many, many years after.

评论概述: Well over a year and still ticking.
评论详情: I got the black and white watch back in August of 2021, and it's currently January of 2023. It's been about 18 months and the watch doesn't have a scratch despite daily use, ticks like it's right out of the box, and looks good while keeping time.  I vaguely recall minor annoyance during setup since you have to adjust the band with a tool they provide, but it must have taken me like fifteen minutes and it was well over a year and a half ago so I don't think that should be a deterrent.  Fair watch for the price. I would purchase again if needed.

I'm a long time burei watch user, and the quality has stayed consistent over the years.  The watch arrives well packaged, as have their predecessors.  The time is extremely easy to set (just pull out the adjustment knob), and I find the day marker convenient, as I end up relying on checking my phone otherwise.I find my wrist size changes frequently based on diet/exercise, so I find size adjustment pretty important.  The sizing mechanism on this watch doesn't require any sort of link addition - I just pop up a metal piece with an arrow on it, slide the latch to where it's comfortable, and press the metal piece back down.  Takes less than a minute, which allows me to stay comfortable with minimal effort.  I was also pleasantly surprised at the level of abuse these watches can withstand.  From exercise, to construction, to landscaping, the watch remains operational and mostly unscathed.  I've accidentally run one of these watches through a washer and dryer, and it was fine. It will scratch against metal and stone though, so I wouldn't treat it as indestructible, but it'll fair surprisingly well against heavy use.Overall, these watches have a quality consistent with watches that are around triple the cost, and it feels significantly more solid than any other watches I've seen at this price point.
